pydna package¶

Submodules¶

pydna.seq_utils module¶

pydna.seq_utils.complement_codon(input_codon)¶
pydna.seq_utils.is_codon_correct(input_codon)¶

Function to check for correctness of input codons. It checks if bases belong to one of the allowed DNA bases.

Parameters:input_codon – it is expected to be a three base codon.
Returns:returns True or False 
>>> from pydna import seq_utils
>>> input_codon = 'ATC'
>>> seq_utils.is_codon_correct(input_codon)
True
